replies.author: wjtcc
replies.txt_content:
http://www.minecraftforum.net/to ... maps-for-minecraft/

Minecraft v1.5.1 with Forge v7.7.1, MCPC-Plus v1.5.1: DynmapForge v1.7-alpha-2
点后面的adfly下载

解压后有个压缩文件和dynmap文件夹
dynmap文件夹丢到服务器根目录下，压缩文件丢到mods文件夹里面

replies.author: alecone
replies.txt_content: 用dynmap forge正解.如果还不行.换mcpc plus 版本.还不行.没招了.
